title: Nasus Lore - I need a Shurima History Lover to HELP me in this !!

embed.description: Nasus walked at night, unwilling to face the sun.

body:
Hello guys .. I hope someone can help me with that .. 
I ave 2 Questions:
1- About : Nasus Ouroboros lore .. when did it exactly happen? After Shurima's Ascension or before , and who is the boy in this story? , and why Xerath called him to a new capital ?
.
2- The picture of (Daughter of Setaka) in ( Nashramae Streets) and the second image of (Ascended Hierophant of Zuretta)
Did they Occur before (Nasus vs Xerath)'s event in Vekaura .. or After?
.
[(Daughter of Setaka) in ( Nashramae Streets)](https://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=https%3A%2F%2Funiverse-meeps.leagueoflegends.com%2Fv1%2Fassets%2Fimages%2Ffactions%2Fimage-gallery%2Fshurima-vekaurastreets.jpg&resize=:1200)
[(Ascended Hierophant of Zuretta)](https://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=https%3A%2F%2Funiverse-meeps.leagueoflegends.com%2Fv1%2Fassets%2Fimages%2Ffactions%2Fimage-gallery%2Fshurima-hierophant.jpg&resize=:1200)
>
Thanks In Advanced <3

replies.body:
Nasus Ouroboros lore happens after Renekton and Xerath leave the Tomb of Emperors and after the resurrection of Azir... In "Present times". It seems that after Xerath left the tomb, he took over a city and became emperor of this "new capital" without knowing that Azir ressurected. 

The boy is Renekton as a child... well, a memory of Renekton as a Child created in the mind of Nasus to be exact.

> With a heave, the boy hurled the rock through the air, its perfect arc threatening to shatter mercenary bone on impact.
> “Renekton, no!” roared Nasus.
> The riders abandoned their half-hearted deception. Nasus knew then that the caretaker and his wife were dead. Xerath’s greeting would come in the form of cold steel. Truth began to eclipse illusion.
> Nasus reached for the boy. The child tore into shadows of memory that dissipated across the starlit ground.
> “Goodbye, brother,” whispered Nasus.

And about the picture: Considering that Setaka died like.... looooong time ago, its safe to say that the picture is from the times before the "fall of Shurima" (aka, when Xerath destroyed the place).

I have to disagree with your last point. "Daughter of Setaka" is most likely a title that has been held my many women through the ages, and not actually related to Setaka's biological offspring (if she even had any). The word "Ascended" has sometimes been used to describe Shuriman nobility even if they haven't undergone an Ascension ritual, so I don't think that figure is an actual Ascended beneath that hood.

So I think that picture depicts modern Shuriman culture, although wether it is set before or after the Vekaura incident is impossible to say.

> [{quoted}](name=Epicurus,realm=OCE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EFwhj3Nx,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-12-22T04:21:29.157+0000)
>
> I have to disagree with your last point. "Daughter of Setaka" is most likely a title that has been held my many women through the ages, and not actually related to Setaka's biological offspring (if she even had any). The word "Ascended" has sometimes been used to describe Shuriman nobility even if they haven't undergone an Ascension ritual, so I don't think that figure is an actual Ascended beneath that hood.
> 
> So I think that picture depicts modern Shuriman culture, although wether it is set before or after the Vekaura incident is impossible to say.

Just wanted to confirm what Ebonmaw and Epicurus have deduced here.

The boy in the Ouroburos story is poor, lonely, broken, Nasus' memory of his younger brother Renekton, from when they were children.  Probably from just before Nasus left him to attend the Collegium of the Sun.  Xerath is summoning Nasus to Nerimazeth so that Nasus can kneel and pledge loyalty before the empire's rightful ruler (as far as Xerath is concerned).  Nerimazeth was once, long ago, a capital, but lay abandoned for a _very_ long time.

> "_The Shuriman city of Zuretta is ruled by Hierophant Hadiya Nejem, who believes herself to be a descendant of the Ascended warrior Setaka._"

I'm not finding your image links to be working, but if we're going by [this image](https://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=https%3A%2F%2Funiverse-meeps.leagueoflegends.com%2Fv1%2Fassets%2Fimages%2Ffactions%2Fimage-gallery%2Fshurima-hierophant.jpg&resize=:1200) labelled the 'Daughter of Setaka' then as Epicurus says - there's no reason to assume that the 'Daughter' is actually a literal daughter of the legendary Ascended warrior, despite what she says.  It _could_ be (like the priest Azrahir Thelamu in Vekaura) a claim to legitimacy that has no basis.  

There's not enough information to go on (but I will say that the building behind her looks a bit tatty and old to be from the height of the empire.)

Speaking of image links, just so folks don't get confused (like I did) [this image](https://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=https%3A%2F%2Funiverse-meeps.leagueoflegends.com%2Fv1%2Fassets%2Fimages%2Ffactions%2Fimage-gallery%2Fshurima-vekaurastreets.jpg&resize=:1200) of the Streets of Nashramae has a filename that mentions Vekaura.  Just a mistake when it was being made, no secret there.  Sorry.
Oh I see, thanks for the confirmation and clarification... But i just want to mention that the image links that you made do not work as well.

> [{quoted}](name=Ebonmaw Dragon,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EFwhj3Nx,comment-id=0000000000000002,timestamp=2017-12-22T16:46:36.613+0000)
>
> Oh I see, thanks for the confirmation and clarification... But i just want to mention that the image links that you made do not work as well.

Well darn.  That's annoying.  I'm going to write myself a note to ask the Universe folks about those links failing.  Not very helpful of us.  Sorry.

Here's the  link to the Shurima image gallery where the two images are supposed to be: https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/region/shurima/?mv=image-gallery

[EDIT] Well _double wow_.  The link half works!  I find that if I left-click the link, it works but if I open the link in a new tab, it doesn't show any images!  More for the note for the Universe devs!  Doh!

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EFwhj3Nx,comment-id=00000000000000020000,timestamp=2017-12-22T18:06:35.293+0000)
>
> Well darn.  That's annoying.  I'm going to write myself a note to ask the Universe folks about those links failing.  Not very helpful of us.  Sorry.
> 
> Here's the  link to the Shurima image gallery where the two images are supposed to be: https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/region/shurima/?mv=image-gallery
> 
> [EDIT] Well _double wow_.  The link half works!  I find that if I left-click the link, it works but if I open the link in a new tab, it doesn't show any images!  More for the note for the Universe devs!  Doh!

This may be out of the main topic, but since you are going to talk with the "Universe folks"... there is a "bug" or something in the Universe page related to the Promo Sites of the champions (for example Yasuo and Gnar) 

https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/champion/yasuo/

The universe page shows a link to the promo of the champion, but the link goes to the main page of LoL... I guess that the promo pages were deleted or something.

Some people tought that the promo pages were deleted becasue they are not canon anymore... but then, why add a link to the page in the Universe page?

Then again, i know that is out of the topic and you are not related to the Universe Page as far as i know... but who knows, maybe this information help.

> [{quoted}](name=Ebonmaw Dragon,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EFwhj3Nx,comment-id=000000000000000200000000,timestamp=2017-12-22T18:29:37.459+0000)
>
> This may be out of the main topic, but since you are going to talk with the "Universe folks"... there is a "bug" or something in the Universe page related to the Promo Sites of the champions (for example Yasuo and Gnar) 
> 
> https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/champion/yasuo/
> 
> The universe page shows a link to the promo of the champion, but the link goes to the main page of LoL... I guess that the promo pages were deleted or something.
> 
> Some people tought that the promo pages were deleted becasue they are not canon anymore... but then, why add a link to the page in the Universe page?
> 
> Then again, i know that is out of the topic and you are not related to the Universe Page as far as i know... but who knows, maybe this information help.

I've actually already reported this as a bug for a few of the micro-site teasers.  I noticed it a month or two ago while I was going through every page, and let them know.  I imagine it's on the stack with the other updates and improvements and features they're juggling.

Thanks though, and it is annoying that the links are dead right now :(

> Nerimazeth was once, long ago, a capital, but lay abandoned for a very long time.

ohh was Nerimazeth the capital for a new (well new to us) region/ faction from the southern continent? 

I imagine confirmation to that would be spoilers though...
Xerath knew Azir is ressurected just after leaving the Tomb. He senses him.

> [{quoted}](name=Fasmodey,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EFwhj3Nx,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2017-12-22T17:01:12.503+0000)
>
> Xerath knew Azir is ressurected just after leaving the Tomb. He senses him.

Oh, yeah, right_ "Xerath felt another soul return to life beneath the sand, one he had thought long dead. Azir was also newly resurrected as one of the Ascended, and Xerath knew there could be no peace for either of them while the other yet lived."_ i forgot that, thanks.
